hits.definition:
去

[qù] go, leave, depart

(opposite of 来lái)

之

[zhī] <subordinator similar to 的 de>, it (in classical texts)

她

[tā] she, her

么

[me/mo] (F麼, 末) (interrogative suffix)

    什么 ? shénme ? what ?;

    为什么 ? wèishénme ? why ?

    没什么 ! méi shénme ! It doesn't matter!, Never mind!;

    怎么 ? zěnme ? how ?

[yāo] (S 幺) youngest, one (e.g. in bus/house/phone numbers)

而

[ér] (= 而且 érqiě) and, furthermore, (= 然而 rán'ér) yet, even so

好

[hǎo] good, good to..., easy to...;

    你好 ! Nǐhǎo! Hello!

[hào] to like

[hāo] 好好儿 hǎohāor in perfectly good condition

都

[dōu] all

[dū] (= 首都 shǒudū) capital city
